      • addRoleToUser

        public void addRoleToUser(java.lang.String roleType,
                          java.lang.String email)
                   throws BusinessException
        Adds a role to a user. If the role type does not exist it will automatically add the new role type to the database. If the user already has the role, this method will do nothing.
        Parameters:
        roleType -
        email -
        Throws:
        BusinessException

      • addPermissionToRole

        public void addPermissionToRole(java.lang.String permissionType,
                                java.lang.String roleType)
        Adds a permission to a role. If the permission type or role type don't exist it will automatically add them to the database. If the role already has the permission this method will do nothing.
        Parameters:
        permissionType -
        roleType -

      • revokeRoleFromUser

        public void revokeRoleFromUser(java.lang.String roleType,
                               java.lang.String email)
                        throws BusinessException
        Revokes (deletes) a role from a user. If the user doesn't have the role to be revoked, the method will do nothing. If the specified roleType doesn't exist, nothing happens.
        Parameters:
        roleType -
        email -
        Throws:
        BusinessException

      • revokePermissionFromRole

        public void revokePermissionFromRole(java.lang.String roleType,
                                     java.lang.String permissionType)
        Revokes (deletes) a permission from a role. If the role doesn't have the permission to be revoked, the method will do nothing. If the specified permissionType doesn't exist, nothing happens.
        Parameters:
        permissionType -
        roleType -
